snippet: Gov. Bobby Jindal on Thursday signed into law new restrictions against abortion, saying they will protect women and the unborn.
abstract: Louisiana Gov Bobby Jindal signs into law new restrictions against abortion, saying they will protect women and the unborn; abortion-rights groups say restrictions will shutter at least three of Louisiana's five abortion clinics.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bobby Jindal on Thursday signed into law new restrictions against abortion, saying they will protect women and the unborn.

headline.main: Louisiana: Governor Signs New Abortion Restrictions
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Governor Signs New Abortion Restrictions
